name: ignore
description: Ignore is a manager and filter for .gitignore rules.

scripts.test: npm run tsc && npm run build && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec ./test/ignore.js && codecov
scripts.test-no-cov: npm run tsc && npm run build && mocha --reporter spec ./test/ignore.js
